page.title: 01OUR BLOCK
page.content: WE HAVE DRIVEN AROUND OUR BLOCK IN A MINIBUS AND CARS,WE HAVE ALSO WALKED ALONG ROADS AND FOOTPATHS.THIS IS AN AGRICULTURAL AREA WHICH IS KEPT WELL WATERED BY THE RIVER STOUR WHICH SOMETIMES FLOODS THE FIELDS AND VILLAGES.THE TWO VILLAGES OF STURMINSTER MARSHALL AND SHAPWICK ARE ON DIFFERENT SIDES OF THE RIVER.YOU CAN GO FROM ONE TO THE OTHER BY CROSSING WHITE MILL BRIDGE.ALL THE LAND IS FENCED AND IS USED FOR FARMING.THE LARGE MILK FACTORY IN STURMINSTER MARSHALL HAS CLOSED DOWN AND THE BUILDINGS ARE NOW USED BY MANY SMALL FIRMS.THIS VILLAGE IS SLOWLY GROWING BIGGER BUT MANY OF THE PEOPLE LIVING HERE DRIVE OUT OF THE AREA TO THEIR WORK.THE SCHOOL CHANGED FROM AN ALL AGE SCHOOL 5-15 TO A PRIMARY 5-11 AND IS NOW A FIRST SCHOOL 5-9.
